long_description: Don't get left out in the cold. The SOL Emergency bivvy reflects up to 90% of your body's heat back to you. Bright orange exterior is easy to spot, even in bad weather. Measures 84 in. x 36 in. and is sized to shelter 1 adult. Waterproof, windproof material is seam taped for complete protection from the elements. SOL emergency bivvy packs down small into the included stuff sack.
short_description: Don't get left out in the cold. The SOL Emergency bivvy reflects up to 90% of your body's heat back to you.
